name: Wood Games 3D
description:
Revived Wood Games 3D. Reimplemented the leaderboard, made it gdpr-compliant, so that it's publishable again. 

Compete in 6 different disciplines, become world champion in one of the daily world championships and enter the "Hall of Fame". Climb the global leaderboard, collect achievements, challenge friends or the whole world! What are you waiting for? Show them that you are the best athelete!

Disciplines:
- Long Jump
- Sprint
- Hurdles
- Shooting
- Middle Distance
- Shot and Run
- Cross

Startup Info:

On first startup you are asked to create an account where you only need to choose a nickname and a password. You can add an email-address as well, but this is optional and is only needed to recover your password.
